dialogue.String: 1�It won't open from this side.
1�You find 6���� marked with the sign of the eye.
1�Light the torch?Yes.No.
1�Light the torch?Yes.No.
1�Say the vow.All right.Not right now.
1�Say the first word.
1�Speak the second word.
1�Utter the third word.
1�Were you worried about me?That's right.Never.
1�But the first Star Sibyl gained the powers of the stars and moon at Full Moon Fountain. She found the stars of hope from within the darkness, and led Windurst to glory.
1�Why, hello again.What are you doing here?
1�I'm resting right here. I never thought the day would come that I'd find a place I couldn't sneak into.
1�Say, you didn't follow me here out of worry, did you?
1�Hah! The only reason you're here is because that Sibyl Guard Semih Lafihna ordered you to follow me, right?
1�I see. The only reason you're here is because that Sibyl Guard Semih Lafihna told you to follow me, right?
1�She may have been raised by the Star Sibyl, but she's just a Mithra. She has no idea how serious this is.
1�You've heard the legends of the Star Sibyl, right?
1�In days of old, a shining star guided us to this place. When the star returned to the heavens, the light that lit Sarutabaruta faded, and darkness fell on the land.
1�She also left a historical text for future Sibyls. They found it recently... The Book of the Gods.
1�And still the Star Sibyl is silentaru.
1�That's why I came here... To find another witness of time. I wanted to seek out the Yagudo.
1�They sure gave me a hearty reception, but the Yagudo king told me something...
1�Anyway, tell Semih Lafihna that the head of the Orastery, Ajido-Marujido, is getting close, slowly but surely.
1�Well, I'll see you around. Back to Windurst for me.
1�Shoo! Shoo! Keep your grimy claws off of Windurst Orastery minister, Ajido-Marujid
1�The towers are all damaged! How do you explain magic still being drained from the plains of Sarutabaruta?
1�What about you Yagudo? What are those things that you continue digging? Those stones...maybe they are the cause of all this?
1�If you hop down here, you be finding shortcut to the entrance of Castle Oztroja.
1�I am Kaa Toru the Just.
1�You be the victor of Balga Contest held in Giddeus, kyah? You be taking this 3���� and your prize.
1�This contest being beneficial for both Yagudo and smoothskins. Valuable knowledge and skills be exchanged.
1�Quawk! You be going back to your nest now. Your victory be the most valuable thing you taking with you.
1�...Kyah! Now what you be wanting?Quawk? You saying you had hard time getting here?
1�Not words me be expecting from champion of Balga Contest, kyah! Victor has a duty to be meeting all challenges. A duty of the just.
1�Kyah?You being the underling of Zeelozok?
1�Ka-kyah!Why would Moblins be keeping smoothskins as pets, hoot!?
1�Ka-kyah!?You being Zeelozok's messenger, here to deliver #���� for Ruu Cogo the Larktongue?
1�Ka-kyah!Ruu Cogo the Larktongue being done here!Ruu Cogo the Larktongue being no more!
1�Ka-kyah!Smoothskin being done here, also!Smoothskin be dying soon, too!
1�Hoot!But I be tiring of war and blood!
1�This time I be letting you go.Be flying home, smoothskin! Ka-kyah!
1�Whaddaya want? You wanna talk to me? Well, I don't wanna talk to you until you got something I wanna hear. Take a hike, buddy.
1��3����?Didn't think I'd ever hear those words from someone who wasn't a Gob. You know some weird stuff, for a person.
1�There's a story that says some things have their own soul.

1�The 5���� used to be just simple hourglasses. But as they passed through the hands of dozens of people, and even a few beastmen as well, the hourglasses were transformed by all their thoughts and feelings.
1�They have the ability to focus mysterious powers. In our travels through all the lands of this world, us Goblins often come across this sorta thing.
1�Now we come to the fun part. If you want a 3����, I'd be willing to sell one to you. And you should know that only us Gobs can tell if an item has its own soul.
1�You people--heck, even other beastmen--have no idea. I've seen you guys throw away these items like they were junk.

1�They may look like garbage, but souled items are rare and valuable.You still want an hourglass, you gotta cough up 
 gil.
1�You want one, you hand me over the money.Like, with a quickness. So how's about it?
1�What's that you got there? � $����?You're quite the collector for one o' your kind.

1�It might just be a worthless piece o' junk for you, but it's priceless to us Gobs.If you want, I can take it off your hands for 
.
1�I add to my collection, you get some pocket change. A win-win situation, right?So just trade that #���� on over, why don't ya?
1�I got a proposition for you. Before the Great War, a different currency was used in each of the three nations.
1�But when gil became the coin of choice, all the other types of money were done away with. Now the old forms of currency are worthless to anyone besides a collector like me.
1�You've never seen them before? Here, take a look at this.

1�This is the least valuable type. It was part of the currency of  [Bastok/Windurst].Since you were able to find out about the #����, I'm guessing you'll be able to get your hands on a few of these.
1�The three nations all had their different types of money, but I'm only interested in the old currency of  [Bastok/Windurst].Collect enough of them and I'll trade you some other stuff I've got.

 	)��������, I'll give you a #����. Either that or I'll trade you for one of the goodies in my treasure hoard. They all go for a different price, however.

1�Old currencies?I was telling you about how the three nations all used to have different types of money. You remember, right?
1�I didn't think there were people who loved this sorta stuff as much as I do. You really understand what things are worth. I don't give discounts, but you're welcome back anytime.
1�I didn't think there were people who loved this sorta stuff as much as I do. You really understand what things are worth. I don't give discounts, but you're welcome back anytime.
1�Yeah, this is the real thing all right.You got some okay junk-collectin' skills for a person.

d.�Maps, ya say?Hah! Just like one o' your kind to need those dingy scraps o' parchment.

1�The 5���� used to be just simple hourglasses. But as they passed through the hands of dozens of people, and even a few beastmen as well, the hourglasses were transformed by all their thoughts and feelings.

1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, �[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.

1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.To Each His Own Right.Spharai.Picture Perfect(pt.1).Picture Perfect(pt.2).Picture Perfect(pt.3).Picture Perfect(pt.4).Picture Perfect(pt.5).To Kill Mocking Birds.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�...At last we meet.
1�I have been freed from my prison and can soak up the sweat and blood of this world once more.
1�Wait, there is something I must...
1�This place is...?
1�I see...You must be the new wielder for these.
1�Yes, with your fighting spirit I believe you will be able to master the #����.
1�The #���� have long accompanied me, along both rough and gentle paths. It is not easy to give them up, but...here.
1�They belong to you now. I ask that you consider my...Ah, but that is past now. I bid you farewell....
1�I hope you don't think this is the end.
1�Your real life as a martial artist is just beginning.Time to start your training anew!
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�...Finally! We finally meet face to face!
1�I have a presence in this world again!What an exhilarating feeling!
1�Ah yes, there is one more thing...
1�Eh? What?
1�Oh.You must be this one's new owner.
1�With your dagger skills, you'll make a perfect wielder for the #����.
1�It is most difficult to give up a weapon that has seen me through so many tight spots, but you have earned it.
1�Treat her well...
1�Splendid!From this day forth, I belong to you.
1�So, what kind of games shall we play?And where shall we go to play them?Who are we going to kill when we get there?It's all just too exciting...!
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�...Thou hast found me.
1�I have now thrice shown my true form in this world.
1�A moment...
1�...What has happened to me?
1�I see, you are the sword's new owner?
1�Well, this is most encouraging!A master of swordplay such as yourself should have no trouble wielding #����.
1�When the world lies in chaos, this blade appears before the one meant to wield it.It is yours...Restore order to Vana'diel!
1�And now I, too, can rest unburdened...
1�Thou art blessed this day.
1�Henceforth, I shall be thy blade.For the sake of thy companions, for justice in this world, wield my power in the name of honor...
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�...You have found me.
1�Allow me to show my respect.You who have gained the strength of so many must be a true hero.
1�But first...
1�Who are you?
1�This must be some sort of joke.You are the new wielder of this weapon?
1�Hmmm, perhaps I have misjudged you.With your level of skill, you may be able to handle this beastly blade, and have the will to control its awesome power.
1�However, this is a magical blade. It is a sword that calls upon destruction. Its malice will gnaw away at your body and soul even as you topple enemies with its strength.
1�Do not forget this truth! Keep it always in your mind.My regards go with you, stranger...
1�Now, my heroic master...
1�For what purpose will you wield my power?The choices before you are without limit.Will you become the ruler of this world? Or perhaps...
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�...You...me, meet.
1�Me...free...Thanks to you. Me, your...
1�What the...?
1�Ah, now I see.The wheel has turned.
1�Truthfully spoken, I am thankful.�#���� is a splendid axe, but ever does it hunger.
1�I have taken many lives to sate its need, and have reached the end of my strength.
1�You have my gratitude.You have freed me from my nightmare, and now I can sleep with a tranquil spirit...
1�You, master, me.Good, work. Me, thank, you.
1�Master, me, hunger.Go, hunt? Find, prey?Me, cut, flesh. Break, bone. Drink, blood.Master, me, hunger...
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�...Ah, you found me!
1�I have been freed from a world where life and death, reality and illusion are impossible to tell apart.I am truly grateful.
1�One moment...
1�...This is...Jeuno!?Have I finally returned?
1�I... Nobody can see me.This is merely a reflection of reality.Which means you are the one to inherit the axe.
1�Hmm. With your polished skills, you will make a fine master for #����.
1�The one who wields this axe must also be beautiful to look upon. Apparently, I was a suitable candidate. Do you not agree?
1�Congratulations.I expect you to perform great deeds from this day onwards.I also ask that someday you use #���� to avenge the Hydra Corps...
1�I congratulate you also...my new master.
1�Now hold me high and let my blade glint in the sunlight!Let your friends, as well as your enemies, feast upon my glorious beauty!
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�...You have found me.
1�My forbidden power is now yours, and I am liberated from my prison.
1�You have but to gain her respect...
1�Such a long dream I was having...
1�It was a dream held captive by a shrouded world.No. I must accept that it was no dream.
1�And you? Do you seek the same darkness that I did...It seems you have already found your way to #����.
1�Very well, I will pass it on to you.But do not forget how much blood your companions spilled in your search for its unholy strength.
1�And think long and hard on whether or not this power should be used. Do not end up like me...
1�Heh. Heh heh.Hahahahahahaha!
1�Well, my new master, is it not time to begin the journey for ever greater power?There are enemies yet to fell, and blood yet to spill...
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�...You have unearthed me at last.
1�I am free from Dynamis, free to fly through the heavens once more.
1�All that remains is...
1�Hello?Is it possible that I...
1�But, no.I have not returned to this realm...You. You are to be my successor?
1�You certainly seem to have the required skill with the lance. Enough to convince #���� to lend you its power, at any rate.
1�Having this spear on the battlefield makes you a match for almost any opponent.
1�Think well on what this means, and on how a weapon like this should be used.You have my admiration, adventurer. You have done well...
1�The ceremony of inheritance is complete.
1�It is time for you to go forth and experience my overwhelming strength...
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�...I have been rediscovered at last.
1�Thanks to you, I have made my escape from the shrouded land.
1�You must now gain the sanction of my master...
1�It is a pity, indeed.
1�This day has come far too soon for my liking.
1�However, you are a master of the ninja trade.I concede that you will make a fitting wielder of the #����.
1�Take this blade as your own.Travel far down the path of the ninja.
1�I will be watching you from the shadows...
1�A fine master...
1�My keen edge is now yours to wield. A sharpness said to make even demons wail...
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�...This day has finally come.
1�I am to be released to this world for the first time in an age.Is this reason to celebrate, or despair...?
1�In any event...
1�What is going on here?
1�Ah, my successor has come.
1�I sought to master the way of the samurai, and traveled to the Far East for training. By the time I had gained the #���� and returned to my home, the Great War had begun.
1�When I think on it, my life has been a long road of trials. But to see the arrival of my successor makes me feel that all has not been in vain.
1�You have my gratitude.Farewell, #����...
1�It has been a hard path to reach this point.
1�But your journey in the way of the samurai has just begun.You have yet to attain perfection.Let us continue your training...
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�...So, you have found me.
1�I must give you my thanks.I have been freed from the hell of Dynamis and can regain my true power once again.
1�And now...
1�Hwaah!
1�Just when I thought I had finally returned to this world, I find you standing here, ready to snatch my precious staff away.
1�Well, it's for the best, I suppose.In my current state, #���� is nothing more than an ornament, its power going to waste.
1�I entrust this staff to you!Take up #����,  , and bind it to you in a contract of blood!
1�I take my leave of you now.I only wish that I was able to stay a little longer...
1�I am yours to wield.
1�But you are not yet my master.By watching your actions from this time onwards, I will decide if you are worthy of the title...
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�...You have discovered my resting place.
1�The prison of souls has let loose its shackles, and I am free to loose arrows in this world once more.My thanks.
1�Ah, one more test of your patience...
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�Boo-hah-hah�`...kupo!
1�Huh? Why aren't you jumping out of your skin in absolute terror?I would've died of fright, kupo!
1�Here, take this as a testament to your courage.Exchange it for the item your partner received so you can prove that you both reached the goal safely, kupo!
1�Return with the evidence of your success to the moogle in town. Handing over your partner's item will prove that you were both able to reach me, kupo!
1�Oh, and here's a picture of how your partner's face looked when I popped out of nowhere to scare you. You should hand this in at the same time, kupo!Kupupupu...
1�This place is crawling with nasties.You should probably head back to town so you can testify to your partner's bravery.

1�If it gets out that I haven't scared the wits out of a single person yet, I'm going to get into trouble, kupo...
